sentences.sContent: There’s no point in taking unnecessary risks.
sentences.sCn: 冒不必要的风险没什么意义。

sentences.sContent: We can’t afford any unnecessary delays.
sentences.sCn: 我们经不起无谓的耽搁。

sentences.sContent: Williams was found guilty of causing unnecessary suffering to animals.
sentences.sCn: 威廉斯因无故虐待动物被判有罪。

synos.tran: 不必要的；多余的，无用的

trans.tranCn: 不必要的；多余的，无用的
trans.tranOther: not needed, or more than is needed
